job_tasks.phrase: Drive digital transformation by understanding client needs and crafting seamless online experiences.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes understanding client needs and translating them into digital experiences, which aligns with understanding business context and strategic goals.

job_tasks.phrase: Take charge of strategic recommendations and elevate our app and web services.
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to making strategic recommendations and improving services, fitting the definition of business understanding and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: You achieve this by translating customer needs into value propositions and comprehensive end-to-end solutions.
job_tasks.justification: Translating customer needs into solutions is a core aspect of understanding business requirements and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: These solutions encompass the entire process from initial concept to final implementation, ensuring they are aligned with the latest developments in technology, digitalization, legislation, and regulations.
job_tasks.justification: This describes a strategic approach to solution development, considering various external factors and the full lifecycle, which falls under business understanding and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Additionally, you consider the requirements and frameworks set by both internal and external stakeholders, including development teams and regulatory bodies.
job_tasks.justification: Considering stakeholder requirements and regulatory frameworks is a key part of understanding the business and strategic landscape.

job_tasks.phrase: You will focus on improving the user experience of our clients in our digital channels (app & web).
job_tasks.justification: Improving user experience in digital channels involves aspects of software development and integration to enhance existing applications.

job_tasks.phrase: We are responsible for Internet Banking, the ABN AMRO app and new digital initiatives.
job_tasks.justification: Responsibility for existing digital products like Internet Banking and the app implies involvement in their development and maintenance.

job_tasks.phrase: We believe that a flexible approach with multidisciplinary teams focusing on speed, flexibility and efficiency will help in our digital transformation.
job_tasks.justification: Focusing on speed, flexibility, and efficiency in digital transformation relates to the practical aspects of software development and delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: You will work in a pool of Business Developers with a dedicated focus on one of the teams within the Grid. Here you will be part of a scrum team using an Agile way of working:
job_tasks.justification: Being part of a scrum team using Agile methodologies is a common practice in software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Being part of four multidisciplinary dev-ops teams.
job_tasks.justification: DevOps teams are inherently involved in the software development lifecycle, including integration and operations.

job_tasks.phrase: Our digital channels play a key role: not only showing our customers their transactions, but also in helping them make the right decisions with personalized content.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the strategic role of digital channels in providing value and guidance to customers, aligning with business strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: That is why we work hard at ABN AMRO to bring our services to the digital environment, offering customers the seamless digital experience they deserve.
job_tasks.justification: Bringing services to the digital environment to offer a seamless experience is a strategic business objective.

job_tasks.phrase: We are looking for a Digital Business Developer with an affinity for customer experience, who wants to bring our digital offering (app and web) to the next level!
job_tasks.justification: The desire to improve digital offerings and customer experience is a strategic business goal.

soft_skills.phrase: You will be part of a specialized team with other Business Developers.
soft_skills.justification: Being part of a team implies a need for collaboration and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: The spoken language is Dutch and English.
soft_skills.justification: Mentioning spoken languages indicates a requirement for communication in those languages.

soft_skills.phrase: We believe that a flexible approach with multidisciplinary teams focusing on speed, flexibility and efficiency will help in our digital transformation.
soft_skills.justification: Working in multidisciplinary teams necessitates communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: You will work in a pool of Business Developers with a dedicated focus on one of the teams within the Grid.
soft_skills.justification: Working within a pool and teams requires collaboration and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: Here you will be part of a scrum team using an Agile way of working:
soft_skills.justification: Being part of a scrum team implies strong communication and collaboration within the team.

soft_skills.phrase: Working together as a dynamic multi-cultural team.
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly mentions working together in a team, highlighting collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: An environment that simulates to embrace failures as a necessary step to learn quickly.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights a culture that encourages learning from mistakes, which is a key aspect of adaptability and continuous learning.

soft_skills.phrase: For job related questions you can contact Manouk Klaassen (a.i. Lead PO Business Developer Pool).
soft_skills.justification: Providing contact information for questions implies a need for communication.

soft_skills.phrase: Truly surprising insights and innovative solutions for our clients result from an interplay of cultures, knowledge and experience. Diversity is therefore extremely important to our organisation.
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes the value of diverse input and collaboration for generating insights and solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: To ensure that everyone at ABN AMRO can develop their talents, we encourage an inclusive culture in which all colleagues feel engaged and appreciated.
soft_skills.justification: Encouraging an inclusive culture where colleagues feel engaged points to the importance of communication and collaboration.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses heavily on digital transformation, client needs, user experience improvement, and strategic recommendations within digital channels (app & web). While it mentions Agile and dev-ops teams, there is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, LLMs, prompt engineering, RAG, or any specific AI/ML technologies or tasks. The core responsibilities align with traditional software development and business strategy, fitting the 'Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the role's responsibilities, which are centered around digital business development and improving user experience in existing digital channels. There is no ambiguity or mention of AI/ML tasks, making the classification straightforward.
